text: holy cow, somehow i missed all the action last night. Nice work guys!
The boards look great and the videos are awesome.
How easy would it be to test how long a battery lasts now? Could we set it up one morning and keep an eye on it throughout the day?
well if we had some idea of battery usage during one cycle of processor wakeup, wireless warmup, send and receive, and blink leds, we could start making some wild-ass guesses
total battery capacity depends on current draw, ambient temperature so it could get a lot more complex
we should probably get the board fully populated first before mucking with battery stuff unless it was super important to get a grasp of the processor current wakeup time/current draw by itself
here is the datasheet for the panasonic CR2450 battery: <http://na.industrial.panasonic.com/sites/default/pidsa/files/crseries_datasheets_merged.pdf>

attachments.text: Discover how a primary battery can be used to supplement an energy harvesting, energy storage subsystem to create a longer power lifetime for an IoT product.
attachments.fallback: Discover how a primary battery can be used to supplement an energy harvesting, energy storage subsystem to create a longer power lifetime for an IoT product.
